attributes.action: Force Sale Grammar Sixth Form to provide a fridge for students to store lunch
attributes.background: Students at Sale Grammar School Sixth Form should be able to have access to basic facilities to store food in hygenic and sanitary conditions where it will remain edible and free from damage or growth of bacteria.

rejection.details: This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament can do. You could try making this proposal to the school's governing body.
